Welcome to the IAH Superhero Booster Initiative

Each one of us carries a unique creative potential!

There are times in which some of us are challenged by nature, circumstances or otherwise
in the ways we are able to express ourselves
or contribute to society with our unique talents.

However no circumstance or environment is able to suppress our inert talents or our willpower to self-express.

IAH helps Superheros to overcome any disadvantage or hurdle

As part of our mission to help people into their dream job where they can unleash their unique superpowers, IAMHERO Inc has devoted its efforts towards fully supporting those members of our society who are in some way disadvantaged due to special needs or other circumstances.

The conditions which create hurdles for them to get matched to their ideal dream job environments need to be addressed and solutions brought forward to make way for them to thrive in all fairness as others do.

Here is IAH's commitment for Superheros with Disabilities

People who are diagnosed with Autism, Down Syndrome, Blindness or any other medical or psychological condition which would constitute a severe impact in their ability to nurture or execute their superpowers, will be able to use all IAMHERO services for the lifetime of their diagnosed condition for zero cost to them.

IAHâ€™s complete pallet of services will be absolutely free for them to benefit from while they are in such a state of disability.

In addition to that, IAMHERO will waive the fees that are due on the part of the employer in case a hire occurs,
in support of not only the employee but also the employer who decides to integrate such a disabled person into their existing business.

Register here now and create your resume in minutes

Send us an email with your personal story or send us a document stating your diagnosed condition for us to upgrade you to Superhero status.

3

Receive job offers. Hiring you is completely free for potential employers.

If you are or know of any other organization that is supporting people with a medical or psychological diagnosis,

we encourage you to contact us so we can discuss how you could enable your members to be provided with free access to our services as well.

We are looking forward to contribute to a world where anyone can be matched with their ideal energy exchange environment, being inspired and empowered to develop and unleash their full potential and thus, their own superpowers.
